title: Nigerians Assessment of Economy and Living Conditi

content.question: Which of the following is a conclusion drawn from the data about economic conditions in Nigeria?

choices.label: There has been much positive growth in perceptions of economic conditions in Nigeria due to nationalization of the oil industry.
There has been much positive growth in perceptions of economic conditions in Nigeria due to new redistribution policies that give oil money back to the people.
There has been some positive growth in perceptions of economic conditions in Nigeria due to a new governmental policy of jobs for all.
A majority of people do not see economic conditions as very good, partly because corruption is still rampant and economic growth is weak.

content.answer: A majority of people do not see economic conditions as very good, partly because corruption is still rampant and economic growth is weak.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
